column3: 无聊的杂耍到此为止了…

column2:
was
found, but Adol
already had it.
He left it behind.
column3: 已经有了。\n所以就不拿了。

column2: The ring dug into Adol's\nfinger, causing sharp pain.\nAnd it wouldn't come off!
column3: 伴随着一阵刺痛，\n戒指紧紧卡住手指，\n怎么也无法取下。

column2: Adol drank the potion, and\nfelt more deeply aware of\nthe threats around him.
column3: 获得了一种不可思议的感知能力。\n一边显示状态信息一边战斗吧。

column2: A key made of bronze.\nFits neatly into the\npalm of the hand.
column3: 用青铜打造的小钥匙。\n能完全握在手掌中。

column2: A heavy key made of\niron. Slightly rusted.
column3: 沉甸甸的铁制钥匙。\n略微有一点儿生锈。

column2: Made of finely-worked\ngold, with a ruby setting.\nThe end is twisted.
column3: 镶有黄金与红宝石的钥匙。\n插入的部分是扭曲的。

column2: Made of fine, carved\nivory, crafted with\ndelicate workmanship.
column3: 由上等的象牙雕刻而成的钥匙。\n上面有着做工精细的雕刻。

column2: Made of fine, green\nmarble. The end splits\ninto a trident-like shape.
column3: 用翠绿色大理石制成的钥匙。\n钥匙的尖端分成三叉形状。

column2: Made from a pale mineral.\nEngraved with the same\ncrest as the shrine door.
column3: 用青白色矿石制成的钥匙。\n上面刻有与神殿大门上一样的纹章。

column2: The heart of the crystal\nshines like a star in the\nnight sky.
column3: 水晶的中心部分\n像星星一样闪耀着。

column2: The sculpted creature's\ncrimson eyes glitter with\nan eerie light.
column3: 翼龙的红色眼瞳隐隐发光。

column2: Adol gripped the handle\nand chanted, 'Accio Books of\nYs,' but nothing happened.
column3: 试着握住把柄挥了下，\n没什么特别的反应。

column2: The sapphire at the center\nemits a divine sparkle.
column3: 中心大颗的蓝玉\n绽放着神圣的光辉。

column2: It's a large Esterian ruby.\nIt looks pretty valuable.\nBetter put it away!
column3: 艾斯塔里亚产的大颗红宝石。\n看起来价值不菲。

column2: A beautiful golden vase.\nIt's too heavy to carry\nwith only one hand.
column3: 纯金打造的豪华台座。\n重到一只手拿不动。

column2: Doesn't look noteworthy.\nProbably not solid gold.
column3: 没有看上去那么重。\n看来不是纯金制成的。

column2: The words, 'From Donis,\nWith Love' are inscribed on\nthe inner edge of the ring.
column3: 戒指的内侧刻着\n『来自多尼斯的爱』\n......这么一段文字。

column2: With the mask on, all color\nis drained from sight, but\nother things are visible...
column3: 透过面具看出去的景象\n色彩极为暗淡。

column2: The blue gem at the center\nemits a very pure light.
column3: 中心的蓝色宝石\n绽放着纯净的光芒。

column2: A sturdy hammer. Looks\nlike it could break\nanything.
column3: 看起来极其坚硬的大锤。\n好像是用来破坏某种东西的。

column2: It has several lines of\nsome archaic language\nwritten on it.
column3: 写有几行形状奇特的古代文字。
